title: Implement end-to-end authentication tests
description:
Create comprehensive end-to-end tests for the authentication flow.

Changes needed:
1. Create test suite for registration flow
2. Create test suite for login flow
3. Create test suite for logout flow
4. Add error case testing

Files to modify:
- backend/test/e2e/auth.e2e-spec.ts
- backend/test/utils/test-auth.ts

Testing Requirements:
1. Full registration flow with valid data
2. Login flow with valid credentials
3. Logout flow
4. Invalid input handling
5. Duplicate email handling
6. Invalid login attempts
